Job Title: Senior Investment Operations Analyst

Location: Atlanta, GA

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Consulting, General Business

Description:
Senior Investment Operations Analyst in Atlanta, GA

Reconciliation Team

Reconciliation Team member are responsible for handling all reconciliations of data between Bloomberg IBOR, Eagle Pace, and client custodians.

This new team will perform the three-way reconciliation between Custodian, Bloomberg and Eagle Pace on a daily basis, and will follow up and close all breaks identified within agreed service levels. This team will also track open breaks and maintain supporting documentation for the break.

Responsibilities:

Review and reconcile asset data breaks on a daily basisWork with client custodians, portfolio managers and other related parties to resolve breaksWork with Portfolio Managers and Client teams to provide details on approved open breaksBuild up and follow the global standard on asset reconciliation with U.S., UK and Canadian teamsWork closely with other departments with onboarding and trade monitoring of discretionary clientsHelp with special projectsSelf-motivated and professionalAbility to work in a team-based setting

Qualifications:

2+ years with asset management operational experience Outstanding data analytical skillsHigh attention to detail and a high degree of accuracyIntellectual curiosityTechnology and database skillsAbility to work in a fast-paced environmentAbility to work against a deadlineAbility to prioritize and self-schedule deliverable obligations and meet deadlinesExcellent communication skills and the ability to maintain outstanding working relationships with colleagues and vendorsExperience with Eagle Pace and Bloomberg, or equivalent systems, is highly preferredKnowledge of SWIFT system functionality is highly preferredExcel Skills, VBA/macro a plus

Education:

Bachelor’s degree (Accounting, Finance, Mathematics, Statistics is preferred)

How We Support Our Colleagues

In addition to our comprehensive benefits package, we encourage a diverse workforce. Plus, our agile, inclusive environment allows you to manage your wellbeing and work/life balance, ensuring you can be your best self at Aon. Furthermore, all colleagues enjoy two “Global Wellbeing Days” each year, encouraging you to take time to focus on yourself. We offer a variety of working style solutions, but we also recognize that flexibility goes beyond just the place of work... and we are all for it. We call this Smart Working!

Our continuous learning culture inspires and equips you to learn, share and grow, helping you achieve your fullest potential. As a result, at Aon, you are more connected, more relevant, and more valued.
